query:
SELECT gl.id, gl.lojaId, l.nome as loja_nome, gl.gestorId, u.name as gestor_nome
FROM gestor_lojas gl
JOIN lojas l ON gl.lojaId = l.id
JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id
JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
WHERE LOWER(l.nome) IN ('abrantes', 'aeroporto porto', 'águeda', 'algés', 'almada', 'amadora', 'amoreiras')
ORDER BY l.nome, u.name;

JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id
